website_summaries.verdict: A great smoker that won't break the bank or your back. Raised smoker is easy to use at waist level.
pros: Four legs raise the smoker by 30", granting easy access
The easy-to-use RF remote allows you to control your smoker from the comfort of your lawn chair
cons: Some have complained that the control panel started to warp after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SMOKER!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this smoker! I have had it over a month now and I have smoked just about everything you can think of in over that time. At first i was unsure if I wanted an electric smoker. I am so glad I did, set the temperature and the time and walk away! I would recommended this unit to anyone! My only suggestion is to buy a grill mat to place under this smoker! Removing the food will make a mess on your deck!!
customer_reviews.author: TopGun

customer_reviews.title: Shipping issues for big items
customer_reviews.text: The control panel on the top of the unit is housed in plastic. I received the item with a shattered control panel despite all the packaging geared towards protecting that panel (Had hard plastic end caps on the styrofoam, but they packaged it on the wrong side). Still keeping it since I got it for a steal but I would be wary of ordering huge appliances like this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alon

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Received in good condition. Easy to assemble.So far I have smoked a whole chicken and then country style ribs.Great smoked flavor. Love the temp probe. This smoker makes things soooo much easier. The thermometer is very accurate,I checked it with two other devices. Three trays of chips seems to be all I need per smoking session. Udate-just made some great ribs, everything still working right. Have had a few issues, probe keeps going bad, now the control panel is warping, its cheap plastic, still works but prob will not for lonr. Changing stars to 3.
customer_reviews.author: rrapidron

customer_reviews.title: I called Bob and he helped me through it and everything is perfect. Now we can fire up our smoker and ...
customer_reviews.text: Tye Mart truly knows customer service. My previous 2 star review was TOTALLY incorrect. Bob at Tye Mart contacted me by e-mail and I called him. What took days with Amazon took only a few painless minutes on the phone with Bob and my problem was completely and effortlessly resolved. I was incorrectly refunded for my smoker by Amazon and they (Amazon) said they couldn't help. So, I called Bob and he helped me through it and everything is perfect. Now we can fire up our smoker and enjoy. Thanks to everyone at Tye Mart - life is peaceful again. Thanks again so much. Becky Dison
customer_reviews.author: Becky Dison

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smoker.
customer_reviews.text: Love my Masterbuilt smoker. It has turned out some fantastic low and slow BBQ ribs, pork butt, chicken and beef! So easy! Just plug and play. I think the remote control and timer is wonderful. I have tried it with several types of wood. So far my favorite is apple wood for park, hickery and oak for beef or chicken and mesquite for beef. I do not understand some of the negative reviews. Mi e has worked several times without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: dreamdancer

customer_reviews.title: Noticed the control panel cover started getting bad few months ago
customer_reviews.text: Bought a year ago. Noticed the control panel cover started getting bad few months ago, then today, the cover is totally gone. Called manufacture customer support, just out of 1 year warranty, that plastic cover cost $49 plus shipping and handling. It clearly a design defect. The whole unit using solid mental, but that cover is using cheapest plastic, it is like a film.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Dong

customer_reviews.title: Smoker Worked for a year but..............
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this smoker for my birthday in 2016, by 2017 of November the digital control panel was broken / inoperative. I also purchased the small cold-smoker / hopper, when I unboxed the hopper and added it to the main cabinet, it was missing hardware. Masterbuilt only gives you one hook bolt, you must go to Home Depot and buy all-thread to complete the install. Adding insult to more injury the heater element broke after a year. Make a long story short-er buy the extended warranty because this entire smoker WILL BREAK in a year.
customer_reviews.author: NotChuckNorris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smoker
customer_reviews.text: It's excellent and works great. Customer service was very quick and helpful. Wood chip pros and cons: Pro: we use a lot fewer wood chips. Con: the wood chips need to be refilled every hour or so (our last smoker let us put in a large number of chips and then leave it for hours) The negative is that 1) the instruction manual was poor (regarding how to get started - how to use water pan, vent on top, how often the wood chips are added) and required calling the 800 number for what should have been obvious questions to address in the manual. Fortunately customer service was knowledgeable and quick to answer the questions.
customer_reviews.author: T. S.

customer_reviews.title: Smoked Ribs Anyone?
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Masterbuilt smoker as it was ordered to replace the 2nd one we had because the controls on the top eventually became brittle with exposure to the sun and was terribly illegible. It's a great smoker just wish they would improve the controls/touchpad material so it would last longer. I've smoked Mac & Cheese, veggies, ribs, chicken & fish and it always comes out delish as well as getting the neighbors all hot & bothered Lol!
customer_reviews.author: GardenParty

customer_reviews.title: great smoker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker. I have had it now for about 4 months and have used it 6 times. It is very simple to set-up and use. The included thermometer is right on, I used another wireless to verify. The glass is a good addition, but after using and actually thinking about it is kind of pointless. the sindw will get smokey and not able to see through it anyways. The ease of use makes this perfect for those of us who dont want to have to tend the charcoal to keep it up. Great so far, will keep updating if anything else arises.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY disappointed that I was unable to get more use out ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the smoker about a half dozen time and it has always been covered when not in use. I tried to use it recently and the digital control panel would not work. The remote would not activate it either. The timer would work, but the temp control would not do anything. I was unable to get the temp to rise enough to burn the wood chips. I am VERY disappointed that I was unable to get more use out of it especially since I spent more so that I didn't get a low end model. I read online that several others have had the same issues with the smoker.
customer_reviews.author: kshpr

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the product so far
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product so far. It arrived when expected and was packed pretty well. It did not take but an hour or so to put together. I am looking forward to using it in the next couple of days. The only disappointment is that one of the water bowl water bowl rack supports (P/N 9007140038 arrived broken so I cannot use one of the cooking racks until this part is replaced. I will call Amazon for support on this. the product would be a 5 stars except for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Inaseateveryweek

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Down Right After Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 3 masterbuilt smokers and every single one had the heating element break down within a year and a half. I keep them in the garage and out of the elements. There's a reason their warranty is only 1 year! Will never get another Masterbuilt product again.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Great, not sure about the temperature probe though.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this one to smoke some chicken and it worked as expected. My only complaint is the temperature probe. The readings from the chicken were quite a bit off. When I pulled the chicken out and used a high quality probe, the temp difference was about 15 off. I am doing ribs for the 4th of July, so I will see how it works with thicker meat that will allow the probe to go deeper, that may have been the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Roadblock

customer_reviews.title: An easy way to smoke pork, beef, chicken, or whatever you like.
customer_reviews.text: A great price for a quality smoker. I have not calibrated the heating element to the internal thermometer, but the initial run was a delight. Not having to get up throughout the night to check on temperatures was great too. Cleanup took an hour or so with some white vinegar and paper towels. the inside will never look new again, but it's clean and sanitary without a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Should have gotten one earlier
customer_reviews.text: Received order in most timely fashion....Used it 5 times in the first month with no problems......Love the remote control capability........During the 6th time using it, the meat probe went nuts and started reading much too high.......Called Masterbuilt the next morning and got a very pleasant associate who bent over backwards to make me satisfied......Have a new probe on the way and another pair of gloves with it for my trouble......Summer and smoked meats and veggies.........Perfect.....Now if I could just teach it to make potato salad........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed on First Try
customer_reviews.text: My unit keeps shutting off after a short time heating and then it is unresponsive until it has completely cooled. I contacted Masterbuilt and they said they could send repair parts, but not until the end of July (~6 weeks), so I am returning this smoker to Amazon and I am very disappointed with the support from Masterbuilt. I am going to try a replacement since many of the other reviews are so positive, so my fingers are crossed! But I am not looking forward to spending all the time disassembling the first smoker to return it and then having to assemble the new smoker all over again. What a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Brand new and it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few weeks ago to use when the weather got a little cooler. So this morning I decided I should preseason the unit like the instruction stated. I plugged it in and there is no power to the unit. I've tested the outlet and it works fine. The smoker just doesn't work. Brand new and it's a lemon. Now I have to deal with the hassle of returning it. Very disappointing smoker.
customer_reviews.author: William Yates

customer_reviews.title: It works great but don't trust the built in temperature readings
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make Bacon. It works great but don't trust the built in temperature readings. I found that mine 20 degrees lower than the actual temperature. I set it to 225 but the actual temperature is 245 according to a couple of other sensors. I still give it five start because I knew I'd have to experiment to get the temps correct.
customer_reviews.author: Pontiac GTP

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED - USELESS 3 YEARS LATER.
customer_reviews.text: Got this during Prime Day and it was a great buy. First one came dented, Amazon corrected that super quickly and sent out a new one. Made ribs first day and they were amazing. Easy to put together with clear instructions. We want to smoke everything now. UPDATED - The smoker is completely useless after only a handful of uses. It is completely rusted even though it was stored with the cover that was provided. Something this expensive should last longer than a few years and a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. We had been using a charcoal smoker for years, and loved it. Lately, we have been frustrated with how we have been a slave to the weather and the charcoal. A friend had purchased this last year and highly recommended it, so I bought it. My husband is so happy with it, he tries to smoke something every weekend -- and we can, because we don't have to worry about being stuck at home for 8 hours to make sure the temperature doesn't drop.
customer_reviews.author: Tater Salad

customer_reviews.title: remote control and thermometer is the best. Now I'm not chained to the smoker all ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh, man... remote control and thermometer is the best. Now I'm not chained to the smoker all day. I can drink my beer and read my book inside if I want to...and in Maine that is a huge incentive for winter BBQ. Pros: Easy. Everything about it is easy. I feel like I'm cheating at smoking. Cons: It's smaller than you think. It's not quite wide enough for rack of ribs without cutting it. I'm still trying different configurations which tells me: it's smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Ehellbow

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a great smoker
customer_reviews.text: Great Price for a great smoker. Haven't got to use it alot, but when we did, It got the job done. Very easy to use. The light is not placed correctly on unit, so when you turn the light on, you have to open the door to benefit by it, but that is just a mfg. flaw. Does not affect the performance a bit. Otherwise a great little smoker for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Should have gotten one years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this smoker just three times since I ordered it a month ago, and it works flawlessly! I've done ribs twice and a chicken once, all were delicious. I clean the glass window after each use with a mild dish soap and it's ready to go again. The remote is a very nice feature because I can check the temp and time remaining all from the comfort of my lay z boy. Nice smoker without the hassle of charcoal. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Smarty Pants

customer_reviews.title: Broke after four uses
customer_reviews.text: This broke after 4 uses, and Masterbuilt won't provide replacement parts without a hefty fee. I expected to get more than 4 uses out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker, nicely priced.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, i would have gone with the regular unit with out the window. Kind of a hassle to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems good so far, I smoked the flat of a brisket and results are fine. I'm used the remote far more that I would have thought. I like smoking low and slow and temps have to be higher to create smoke, but that is not a fault of the smoker. The light is pretty much cosmetic as it only lights the outside front of the smoker. I guess that helps if the smoker is open but I really don't do that much (if at all). Overall I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John Bogdon

customer_reviews.title: product does not run at accurate temp - have ot ...
customer_reviews.text: product does not run at accurate temp - have ot really keep an eye out - runs 5-10 hotterthan on display
customer_reviews.author: Morgan H.

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for father's day. Arrived on time, packaged well with all the parts and no damages. So far he has done ribs, salmon and beef jerky using recipes in the book and everything has been delicious. Thanks Masterbuilt as always a great product!
customer_reviews.author: sandielreese

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWESOME!! Easy to use and creates excellent smoked meats. I love it! This is the first smoker I've owned. In the past I had used a friend of mine's charcoal smoker, it was big and a hassle to maintain a constant temperature. This unit is basically a "set it & forget it" piece of equipment. The temperature is constant and the smoke is even. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.

customer_reviews.title: Everything comes out awesome. He loves the remote and being able to ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this smoker! We have used it about 8 times already. Everything comes out awesome. He loves the remote and being able to know what the temperature is inside and what the meat temperature is. He is in 7th heaven!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a hobby smoker.
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this smoker. So far I have smoked pheasants and also trout, and both came out perfect. The only drawback I have found is the wood tray could be a bit larger. Easy to use and I like the remote.
customer_reviews.author: My Account

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This one replaced my older Masterbuilt smoker and I love both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Easy to assemble. Only issues, the included instruction/recipe book did not offer more instructions on how the smoker operates and temperature fluctuates. Otherwise operation is very easy and simple and results are quite tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker.
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker. It's everything I wanted. First arrived damaged but they sent out new one quickly. Everything I've cooked has turned out awesome. And this is my first time using one. Love it for real.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Smoking deal
customer_reviews.text: Done ribs, chicken, pulled pork, and jerky since getting it. Works great. Meat thermometer on this unit is very accurate and easy to use. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: jason jones

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this smoker
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this smoker. This is my first electric smoker, and it works wonderfully. Very easy to assemble, use, and clean. I've been recommending this model to friends who are in the market for outdoor cooking appliances for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: C Toth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for smoker. Works great Only issue is smoke tray for wood chips. Prefer it to hold more
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SMOKER
customer_reviews.text: My first smoker, it is really easy to use, with the remote I can do everything from inside my house, set temperature and time check temp while cooking. If only the meat would put inself and out I could just sit in my recliner and watch tv until done.
customer_reviews.author: DWAYNE DYE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this smoker and all of it's well thought out features!
customer_reviews.author: Presto

customer_reviews.title: Like the smoker
customer_reviews.text: Like the smoker, meat probe wire was sliced between the shelf rack, doesn't work.... Got the three year protect plan, I'll use it if it stops smoking...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing worked fine for the first 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked fine for the first 3 uses. After that It starts to work and then randomly decides to stop heating the inside. The thing is a waste. Hoping that Masterbuilt will fix it under warranty!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased. It's easy to use and makes wonderful smoked products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker my wife and I like it and will use it a lot. The stand with wheels make it easy to move around. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Bennett III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy Set up and makes me look like a master smoker..
customer_reviews.author: Johnb352

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Love this smoker. First unit came damaged Amazon was amazing, sent out new and picked up damaged unit. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kellylmholt

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my dad for Christmas and with ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for Christmas and with the weather he just tested the smoker out today - it gives him an error code for the electrical circuit to the built-in meat thermometer and will not function... I hope MasterBuilt stands behind their products, or I'm out $250 :(
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: Like to be able to view whats being smoked without ...
customer_reviews.text: works as expected , this is an upgrade fir an earlier model , Like to be able to view whats being smoked without having to open the door. attached meat therometer is a nice feature with the remote
customer_reviews.author: john weaver

customer_reviews.title: Smoker is easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Smoker is easy to assemble and use. Smoked baby back ribs first then did a beef brisket, both turned out delicious.
customer_reviews.author: ed gilmore

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not so great
customer_reviews.text: Works good for Electric. But, can not duplicate flavor of my original charcoal/wood or gas fired smoker. Also much smaller then advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Opitz

customer_reviews.title: HAVE NOT EVEN HAD IT A YEAR. ONLY USED ...
customer_reviews.text: HAVE NOT EVEN HAD IT A YEAR. ONLY USED A COUPLE TIMES AND IT JUST STOPPED WORKING. WAS A GIFT FOR MY HUSBAND. NOW I CANT SEND IT BACK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic smoker
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. remote is great no more checking the smoker, just setup and monitor the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Moses

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to clean up but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker for up to 6 people. The remote with Bluetooth works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best value online for electric smoker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my adult son's birthday. He loves the smoker's convenience, accessories, and window.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with my purchase except that there was a broken ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my purchase except that there was a broken piece. I will contact the seller and see if I can get a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: This smoker was everything I expected and more. a great unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker, quality build. I'd buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Troy McKaskle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality, didn't take long to assemble. The only gripe is that there are a lot of parts to clean.
customer_reviews.author: adam3000i

customer_reviews.title: great smoker, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but requires some cleaning. Great looking, spacious...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Door buckles in middle where latch is, hope it ...
customer_reviews.text: Door buckles in middle where latch is, hope it keeps it's seal!!! Cheap design obviously. Works well for now. Will comment again in 6 mo....
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Grgurich

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great machine works well,chip holder a little small,had to add chips every 45 mins. but overall great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic smoker! This is my second one of these smokers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the smoker. Took to the beach camping. Used it all week and couldnt be happier.
customer_reviews.author: W.E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Verticle cooking has it's drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed. heat comes from the bottom. Food on each of the 4 shelves get cooked at a different time. Pull all the food out at one time and food is not evenly cooked. Not sure why they put glass in the door. While it cooks all you see is the smoke. After a few uses, you can't get the glass clean enough to see the food even if the smoke would let you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The cover over the controls is starting to peel up
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked simplicity to assemble, looks, legs to raise to better height. I wish it could use pellets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3rd party source for parts nonexistent
customer_reviews.text: Look online there are no 3rd party source parts, available. Arrived with dent on door Amazon made me a deal to keep it. Unpacked it and assembled it and discarded packing materials. LCD control panel lights up enter Temperature & Time but circuit won't close for element. Now I got to wait on masterbuilt warranty for parts. Probably circuit board. MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.author: Bill Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It's a wonderful Smoker, however the Faceplate arrived BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful Smoker, however the Faceplate arrived BROKEN, and I've been unsuccessful getting it replaced or fixed, or any response in fact from my inquiries regarding such. it smokes Great - wish it did not have a cracked face plate, it is a replacement part -
customer_reviews.author: WhiteKnight

customer_reviews.title: meat probe gauge failed after 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Built-in meat probe gauge failed within in 30 days after 2nd use. Useless now. Need to keep buying external gauges or start cutting meat up prematurely. The replacement part is $29. Out of 30 days warranty. Oh and it arrived banged up with large dent at the upper hinge, material is REALLY thin.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Z

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Heating element didnt work out the box. So sorry cant review returned/refunded. Bought a traeger.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lee Walker

customer_reviews.title: what a piece of crap. 3 remotes and 1 controller later
customer_reviews.text: I have the old school 30 inch with the old controller,7 yrs and still going strong.i wanted to up grade so I purchased the gen 2 with the window and remote,what a piece of crap.3 remotes and 1 controller later, the remote still doesn't work.the glass door leaks really bad.dont waste ur money on the new masterbuilts.
customer_reviews.author: BRADLEY R.

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA =JUNK?
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT DOES NOT WORK. There is a separate trouble shooting guide that is larger than the owners manual! I have taken the time to order a replacement heating element after troubleshooting the unit. It looks really cool sitting on my patio! Lesson learned. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric smoker
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, does a wonderful job of cooking. I cook the chicken and ribs , my first time. Now I'm ready to experiment and other items.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L. Carter Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubby's surprise 40th birthday. It is such a great purchase! Super easy to use and what a great deal! The gloves and cover that are included are a must.
customer_reviews.author: J. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker, Used it twice so far and outstanding results.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love this smoker
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker. It heats up quickly and keeps a consistent temperature. The front loading glass door makes it easy to see what is going on inside. Clean up is also pretty easy, so you can't lose with this small smoker!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Brock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and use. Have smoked several different types of meats and they all turn out delicious. Very easy to clean too. I recommend the cold smoker unit so the smoke lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: The wood chips ignite when you first turn on but if your smoking at a low heat the chips do not stay lit so no smoking. Disappointed, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of receiving damaged goods!
customer_reviews.text: So far we are not off to a good start... Was super excited to get this and it showed up with a broken bracket that holds one of the shelves in...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but came scratched.
customer_reviews.text: Only giving a bad review because the unit had a scratch on top and I didn't have time to send back before my cookout.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Crosby

customer_reviews.title: That said I would like to point out an error in the "setup guide" ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not smoked any meat in this just yet. I am waiting another week for the weather to warm up. That said I would like to point out an error in the "setup guide" for this machine. Once you have this machine all setup and ready to go you need to season the inside. The user guide fails to tell you to rub down the entire inside with cooking oil before you turn it on and season it. Most home cooks know what seasoning entails but I wanted to put this out there for those who do not. I will circle back again in a week or so when I put this thing through its paces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packing or handling...
customer_reviews.text: Based on how the assembly is required, I flipped the box over and sat the unit on carpet to assemble. The unit remained upside down throughout the unpacking and assembly process. It wasn't until the unit was totally assembled and inverted that I noticed the two dents along the back and sides of the unit. Took me over an hour to unpack and assemble, now I either keep a damaged unit or spend another hour disassembling, repacking and then what? Get another unit that has to be assembled again..... No happy at all with this, and I have yet to even plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell B. AIA

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt 20076816 4-Rack Digital Electric Smoker with Leg Kit Cover and Gloves, 30", Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueOur digital electric smoker is perfect for the beginner or the pro. You'll achieve competition-ready results in your own backyard, without the hassle of charcoal or propane. Simply plug this smoker in, set the digital controls, and it does the work! Master built makes smoking simple.
feature_bullets: Four chrome-coated smoking racks - smoke 80 lbs. of food!
800 watt heating element for even, consistent smoking up to 275 Degree F
RF remote controls temperature, time, food light, on/off, and monitors meat temperature
Legs add 10-inches of height for easy access
Also included are smoker cover, carving gloves and 25-recipe cook booklet of smoking dishes
